jamie foxx tried out life as a blind man

number five margot robbie held her

despite being a lackluster film in terms

one of the biggest assets the film had

robbie had to perform underwater now
this is always dangerous but there are

waiting
despite this robbie prepared for the

she even had a running challenge with

when clinic matched 5 minutes 30 seconds

to make this happen weaver learned the

number three robert downey jr proved he

chaplin robert downey jr is a consummate

when it came time for him to betray

he gave one of his best performances

tennis as it happens chaplin held the

he also learned to play the violin with
that very

watching the movie would have noticed
there wasn't a critic alive in 1992 who

and that's exactly what he delivered
